h2s.text: Uncover competitors' ad strategies and budgets
h2s.html: Uncover competitors' ad strategies and budgets

h2s.text: Analyze competitors' keywords and ad copy
h2s.html: Analyze competitors' keywords and ad copy
Assess the PPC competition

content.html:
Advertising Research

Take an inside look at your competitors' ad strategies.
Spot their strengths and weaknesses to improve your own campaign.

Examples:
ebay.com
shopzilla.com
amazon.com

Uncover competitors' ad strategies and budgets

  • •
    Monitor your rivals' PPC activities, their ad spends and most profitable ad copy
  • •
    Analyze your competitors' Google Ads usage trends
  • •
    View examples of their live ads
  • •
    Discover desktop and mobile keywords your competitors are bidding on

Analyze competitors' keywords and ad copy

  • •
    Discover your rivals' top performing paid keywords
  • •
    See what emotional triggers they are using in their ad copy
  • •
    Learn your competitors' advertising habits throughout the year

Assess the PPC competition

  • •
    Know who your main paid search competitors are
  • •
    Find desktop and mobile keywords your competitors are bidding on
  • •
    View keywords and ad texts for over 100 countries, and in more than 20 languages

Get started!

Explore new advertising opportunities to bring more targeted traffic to your site.
